Once upon a time, in a vibrant ocean, there lived a starfish named Stella who longed to explore the land. Unlike her kin, she had a unique abilityâ€”she could walk on land! One sunny day, she decided to leave her underwater home and venture onto the sandy beach. As she waddled across the shore, she discovered a world filled with colorful shells, curious crabs, and children building sandcastles. Stella shared stories of the ocean's wonders, captivating her new friends. Inspired, the children promised to protect the sea. With each visit, Stella bridged the gap between land and sea, uniting two worlds.
